question-page.title: Information About The Claimant
question-page.description: Let's get started! Please enter the claimant's personal details below. The claimant must enter the required items.Please note that you can submit the claimant's application at any point by selecting Close at the bottom of the page.

validation.message: Application Date should not be a future date
Mobile Phone number is not valid.Should be number and 8 digits
Home Phone number is not valid.Should be number and 8 digits
Other Phone number is not valid.Should be number and 8 digits
Work Phone number is not valid.Should be number and 8 digits
Please enter an valid email!

question.label: Is the claimant's mailing address the same as the claimant's residential address
Mobile Number
question.help-text: Please enter the claimant's Mobile phone number. If the claimant can be reached at a family member or friend's number, please enter this number.

question.label: Are there any other people living in the home?
question.help-text: Please enter the number of people in the claimant's home including the claimant.

validation.message: Alias First Name must be given in only characters(A-Z)
Alias Last Name must be given in only characters(A-Z)
Alias Middle Name must be given in only characters(A-Z)
QID Number entered is not in a valid format.It must be a 1 to 11 digit number.
Date of Birth entered must be after 01-01-1900 or before the current date
Start Date cannot be before birth date
Claimant Date for being a member of the household cannot be future and cannot be before 1900.Please enter appropriate date!

question.label: Does the claimant have a nickname, alias or other name?
Marital Status
question.help-text: Please select the claimant's marital status from the list provided.

question.label: Is the claimant a Resident of Qatar
question.help-text: The claimant must not be out of the country for 180 days in the past 12 months. Â

question.label: Is the claimant a citizen of Qatar?
When did the claimant become a member of the household
Is the household member enrolled in school
What is the highest level completed in school by the claimant?

question-page.title: Income Information
question-page.description: Please tell us about the people in claimant's home who receive income. Examples of income include Salary, Inheritance, Real Estate, Commercial Property, Earned income from paid employment.

question.label: Does anyone in your home receive income?

list-question.label: Please Check the box for Income Details

question-page.title: Income
question-page.description: You have told us that %1s has income, please enter the details below

validation.message: Amount should be greater than 0
Start date must be after Date of Birth
Start date can not be a future date
